Products

Clean Energy Solutions for Every Scale

Shariah-compliant renewable energy and storage solutions designed for commercial, industrial, and residential partners across Pakistan.

Commercial & Industrial

Customized solutions for IPPs and C&I clients to deliver clean power, optimize operating costs, and support long-term energy resilience.

Development and Financing of Solar/Wind Projects

Structured PPAs and equipment rental models that enable long-term clean energy supply for industrial clients and utilities.

  • Power Purchase Agreements (PPAs)
  • Equipment Rental Agreements (ERAs)

Energy Storage as a Service

Enercap electrostatic storage paired with AI-enabled power electronics for high-cycle, non-degrading, and safe energy storage.

  • Electrostatic storage with long life and fast charging
  • Encapsulated capacitor cells (not chemical batteries)
  • Algorithm-based supercapacitor control electronics

Investment in Energy Efficiency Projects

Financing solutions for efficient equipment upgrades that reduce energy wastage and deliver long-term savings.

  • Energy audit-driven retrofit programs
  • Financing for high-efficiency equipment
  • Performance-focused energy optimization

Energy Storage Solutions

A lineup of energy storage platforms engineered for telecom, microgrid, grid, and EV applications.

Telecom

Ensirius storage delivers degradation-free cycles for BTS, data center, and fixed-line network applications.

Microgrid

Enbox solutions provide reliable, stable, and maintenance-free energy from kWh to MWh scales.

Grid

Enpack platforms support grid services and renewable generation stability with low LCOS and a reduced environmental footprint.

EV

Batterix solutions deliver longer range, faster charging, and wider operating temperature performance for EV applications.

Residential

Scalable solar and storage solutions that empower households to transition to reliable, renewable energy.

Rent-to-Own Residential Solar

The B-Smart project delivers convenient residential solar solutions with flexible ownership models.

Residential Energy Storage

Encap, Enwall, and Ensega systems provide safe, long-lasting, and environmentally sustainable home storage solutions.

  • Encap
  • Enwall
  • Ensega

Power Your Home or Business with Burj

Connect with our team to design a clean energy solution that fits your goals.
